product_description: The recalled product is mis-labeled as  Ancient Grain + Vegetable Salad item #25247.  Product is perishable, refrigerated, and packaged in clear dome clamshell plastic container. Net weight approximately 2.6 pounds per package.  Almond slices are visible through a clear plastic container.  The label is read in parts "CONTAINS: WHEAT".
